wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Vincent Kelly (born 1970) is a British radio presenter based in Birmingham.

response: Daniel, Dan or Danny Kelly may refer to:
* Danny Kelly (BBC WM presenter) (born 1970), British radio presenter
* Danny Kelly (boxer), see Colombia at the 2011 Pan American Games
* Danny Kelly (soccer) (born 1969), American soccer player and coach
*18 May – The BBC apologises after BBC WM presenter Danny Kelly joked on air the previous afternoon that The Queen had died.
